Computer.name: HCorps Drop
Computer.file: Please be respectful of the dropserver. This is NOT your personal backup server- any personal items that are not assignment/project pertinent will be PURGED. Conservation of our non-infinite storage space is important. -Zaz

To HackerCorps Members-
A friend of mine has put together a custom x-server theme changer named Chameleon. To use it, download and run the excecutable, and it will scan both your system and the system you're currently connected to for compatible theme settings.
It will change your theme without the need for a reboot, making it more efficient and potentially less risky than a manual theme swap. (Who even does those nowdays, anyways?) -Zaz
If you see this, you should be in the right folder on the DropServer.
